İman ve İbadet.text: Peygamber (s.a.v.) şöyle buyurdu: 'Allah'a ve ahiret gününe inanan kişi, günde beş vakit namaz kılmalıdır.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The best of you is the one who learns the Quran and teaches it.'

The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The supplication of a Muslim for his brother in his absence is readily accepted. An angel is appointed to his side. Whenever he makes a beneficial supplication for his brother the appointed angel says, 'Ameen. And may you also be blessed with the same.''

The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The first thing that a person will be asked about on the Day of Judgment is their prayer. If it is complete, then the rest of their deeds will be considered complete. If it is not, then the rest of their deeds will not make up for it.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'Fasting is a shield from Hellfire, just like the shield of any of you in battle.'

Character and Ethics.text: The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The most perfect believer in faith is the one who is best in moral character.'

The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'Do not be people without minds of your own, saying that if others treat you well you will treat them well, and that if they do wrong you will do wrong. Instead, accustom yourselves to do good if people do good and not to do wrong if they do evil.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The strongest among you is the one who controls his anger.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.'

The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'Be truthful, for verily truth leads to righteousness, and righteousness leads to Paradise. And a man keeps on telling the truth until he becomes a truthful person. Falsehood leads to wickedness and wickedness leads to Hellfire. And a man keeps on telling lies until he is written as a liar with Allah.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The best charity is that which is practiced by a wealthy person. And start giving first to your dependents.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.'

The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'Truthfulness leads to righteousness, and righteousness leads to Paradise. And a man keeps on telling the truth until he becomes a truthful person. Falsehood leads to wickedness, and wickedness leads to Hellfire. And a man keeps on telling lies until he is recorded as a liar.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'No one is given a better or more abundant gift than patience.'

Family and Society.text: The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'He who believes in Allah and the Last Day should honor his neighbor.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'The most perfect believer in faith is the one who is best in moral character and the best among you are those who are best to their wives.'
The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'Paradise lies at the feet of your mother.'
